des: "I came up with this one afternoon in the summer when I just wanted to sit back and pamper myself.  Mmmmmmmmmm delicious!"
ins: Place the ice, milk, coffee flavored liqueur, powdered creamer, cocoa powder, and coconut extract into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth.
